title: Santa Fe, Argentina
description: Dancer, teacher, and tango DJ, Ornella represents a new generation that combines youth, freshness, and a deep passion for Argentine tango. Her energy on the dance floor and her musical sensitivity have brought her to stages and milongas around the world. Behind the decks, she creates atmospheres full of strength and elegance, where each tanda invites dancers to embrace, feel, and enjoy the music with intensity and emotion.

title: Zurich / Bucarest
description: Laura breathes tango every day. In love with it since 2006, she has dedicated her life to teaching, dancing, and DJing — sharing the spirit of the Golden Age wherever she goes. Her sets recreate the warmth and elegance of the classic milongas, weaving rhythmic, melodic, and dramatic moments into a beautiful, danceable flow. The result: a floor filled with energy, smiles, and emotion. Originally from Bucharest and now based in Zürich, Laura DJs regularly in Switzerland and across Europe, bringing her radiant musicality to some of the most beloved marathons and festivals on the continent.

title: Alicante, Spain
description: Olga "La Cachila" is a passionate milonguera and tango DJ. She organizes and DJs the milonga La Cachila, which takes place every Thursday at La Casa del Tango in Alicante, Spain. As a DJ, she has played music at numerous encuentros, milongas, marathons, and festivals in various cities across Spain, the United Kingdom, Italy, Portugal, France, Georgia, and also at several iconic milongas in Buenos Aires. She favors traditional tango, especially emotional and rhythmic orchestras. Her goal is always to create a warm atmosphere on the dance floor and ensure that dancers enjoy themselves to the fullest.

title: London / Argentina
description: Argentine dancer, teacher, and tango DJ, Pablo Rodríguez is widely known for his musical elegance and his deep understanding of the dance’s social essence. Based in London, where he co-directs Tango Space, Pablo has spent years sharing the spirit of traditional tango with dancers around the world. His musical selections reflect the same qualities as his dance — clarity, connection, and a warm, human touch that fills the floor with joy and authenticity.
